rules.title: Rules relating to income
rules.1: By agreeing to cooperate, machines share income that players can divide among themselves.
rules.2: Not agreeing to cooperation, everyone operates their own equipment and gets 40% of the income from it.
rules.3: A player without equipment receives unemployment benefits in all years. They are 70% of the amount of money received by the team member with the lowest income.
rules.4: The unemployment option can only be taken once, which means that all team members receive unemployment benefits. They are 100% of the unemployment benefits received by the team member without the device in the previous year.
rules.5: If the equipment is no longer operable, even then the entire team receives unemployment benefits.
